name: Great Scientist
strategy: The Great Scientist can construct the special Academy improvement which, when worked, produces lots of Science. Further, the Great Scientist lets you immediately gain a large amount of science based on the science output of your civilization. The Great Scientist is expended when used in either of these ways.
historical_info: "Great Scientists" figure out how the world works. They discover that the earth orbits the sun. They sequence DNA and invent quantum mechanics. They cure polio and predict eclipses. They make a civilization smarter. They invent the future.
